quote: Jacob already had technical speed and efficiencies when he started and was one of the top employees on our technical team. We recognized him as powerhouse within the studio and gave him more responsibility, task, and a variety of other work that was not in his wheelhouse. Jacob was able adapt and excel to the task at hand.
highlights: Introduced research repository rituals that cut onboarding time for new teammates in half.
Partnered with engineering to define design tokens that accelerated delivery of net-new features by 40%.
Facilitated inclusive co-design workshops that surfaced overlooked needs from community stakeholders.
